entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:38 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -36.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 8:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -36.8°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -40.9°C
Wind: NNW 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Wind north 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 58. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 7:52 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Blowing snow. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 57 in the morning and minus 52 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 7:52 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:52 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
